about_the_game:
Monospaced Lovers is a semi-hardcore platform-adventure game that defies the traditional Metroidvania formula. The game features exploration-driven quests and puzzles reminiscent of classic Zelda, combined with a visual novel-inspired storyline that's equal parts emotional and philosophical.

The game strives to be original — a novel experience that's more than just a mashup of two existing genres.

A sense of wonder and adventure

✨ Work through unconventional, metafictional puzzles that will make you want to use the in-game hints. Rekindle that childlike sense of discovery with a game that treats you like an adult — inspired by Fez, La Mulana, Majora's Mask, and much more.
​

Plot twists and genre-defying developments

✨ Experience a heartfelt story with a 100,000+ word count. Comedy! Drama! Social anxiety! Philosophy? We dropped the "silent protagonist" trope to create a heroine with her own personality and feelings — and she's always one step ahead of you.
​

A hand-painted world to explore

✨ Chat up the local Tanuki, learn how to translate Slimespeak, and explore every corner of your quaint home town until you've found all 60+ collectibles. The game features non-linear, collectathon-style exploration mixed with RPG-style story quests.
​

Bullet hell meets platforming

✨ Dodge bullets! With 4+ bullet hell boss battles and even more challenge rooms, you'll have to learn how to platform in a whole new way.
​


Clara wakes up to a phone that isn't hers.

On it, she finds a perplexing message left by a hacker named the Gòd o͏f̴ B̴in͠a̸r̨y̧, stating that her time left in this world is short. Her only clue is a series of encrypted messages locked on the device — and a mysterious new friend who woke up to a phone that wasn't his.

What does this enigmatic hacker want? Why is he talking about the end of the world? And what does any of this have to do with Clara's quaint and peaceful life in Haven Heights?

All we know for sure is that if she doesn't embark on this quest... her friends will drag her into it anyway.

​

Are you ready to solve the mystery of the Ġ̸̱ŏ̵̲d̶̺̔ ̴̺́o̵̮̚f̴̹̆ ̷͍͝B̵̦̐i̶̤̾n̷̳̿a̵̘̓r̷͎͐y̴̛̜ and uncover the truth of this strange but comfy world?

Well... it doesn't really matter, does it?

There's no running from the truth — whether you're ready or not.

​

​

Credits

Programming, Writing & Design: Stefan Bhagwandin (@_eternal)
Art: Dannica Doplayna (@sphenop_s)
Music: Michi (@ChillMichi)
VFX Animation: Weilin Zhang (@xenophoss)
Sound Design: Stefan Moser (@effoharkay)

Spanish Translation: Diego Almada Osuna (@Dunkelheyt)
Russian Translation: Stepan Spichak (@adtl48)
Chinese Translation: Kakihara MasO (@KakiharaM)
Japanese Translation: Toshiya Namba (@lonechallenger)
Turkish Translation: Plus Localization (@pluslocalize)
Brazilian Portuguese Translation: Vignett (@blkneko_j)

Publishing (Global): Scarlet String Studios (@scarlet_string)
Publishing (Asia): Astrolabe Games (@Astrolabe_Games)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should work on other distros as well
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: >2GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Game can run up to 2160p 145 FPS.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12 - 10.14
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: App is not notarized and may not run on newer versions of macOS.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: >2GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Game can run up to 2160p 145 FPS.

name: Monospaced Lovers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: >2GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Game can run up to 2160p 145 FPS.

Drogas ilícitas

reviews:
“The Dark Souls of weeb romance games”
The Developer
short_description: Monospaced Lovers is an exploration-driven platformer about closeness and distance. Journey through a metafictional, fantasy-filled land and find the truth of your fragile world before it disintegrates.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Turkish, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
